Name: 罪印 Seal of sins
About the game: 'Seal of Sins' is a independent horizontal action game. It is based on ancient fantasy myths. The mysterious messenger wakes you up according to the agreement, and you have embarked on an unknown journey since then. In a world with a strong ancient and wild atmosphere, you will experience many hardships, compose tragic epics in tense and exciting battles, integrate puzzle-solving elements, and face the dual challenges of strategy and operation! In the wild world, human beings have not yet developed their wisdom, but gods and demons already have the pressure to survive. In order to survive, a war broke out between gods and demons, and human beings were also involved. After the war, a new calamity was born. Forced by helplessness, the gods released the imprisoned human warriors, the suffering human beings, and only the last hope remained. Is it the redemption of sin or reincarnation, waiting for your choice... Who is the winner of that battle? What's the secret? All the secrets are waiting for you to uncover... Game Features 4 different characters, experience different battle strategies. Killed more than ten ancient beasts, and pieced together the mysterious wild magic book. Use three ancient powers to solve the puzzles set by the gods on the road of adventure. Dozens of blueprints are combined to create, collect materials to create the sacred artifact. Highly difficult challenge levels, it is not the manipulator who grows up, but you! Immersive sin domain experience, explore the mysterious wild world together. Maybe the world is bad, maybe the world is full of sin, but even in such extreme circumstances, human beings are trying their best to find warmth and love.
